text:
July 15, 1969
Mr. Albert L. Hulsen
Director Radio Projects
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
555 Madison Avenue
New York City, New York 10022
Dear Mr. Hulsen:
Am enclosing herewith another group
of the NAEB/NER Yearbook/Directory
questionnaires.
More will be on the way as they
come in.
Sincerely,
Kathryn Harris
